title: When simultaneously connected on android and Linux, many discussion elements are not displayed
body:
When simultaneously connected on android and Linux, many discussion elements are not displayed

**To Reproduce**

Started a discussion with a contact today on PC. Most of its answer were not displayed in Linux version but correctly on android. If writing things myself on android, it did not appear.

If I clode and restart, then I get the full exchange. 

**Expected behavior**
See all exchanged things on both displays.


**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
 - OS: Linux
 - Installation package deb
 - Version 1.9.0
 - 
dpkg -s teams-for-linux 
Package: teams-for-linux
Status: install ok installed
Priority: optional
Section: net
Installed-Size: 285661
Maintainer: Ismael Martinez <ismaelmartinez@gmail.com>
Architecture: amd64
Version: 1.9.0
Depends: libgtk-3-0, libnotify4, libnss3, libxss1, libxtst6, xdg-utils, libatspi2.0-0, libuuid1, libsecret-1-0
Recommends: libappindicator3-1
Description: Teams for Linux
  Unofficial Microsoft Teams client for Linux using Electron. It uses the Web App and wraps it as a standalone application using Electron.
License: GPL-3.0-or-later
Vendor: Ismael Martinez <ismaelmartinez@gmail.com>
Homepage: https://github.com/IsmaelMartinez/teams-for-linux

**Additional context**
Was working correctly before 1.9.0
